overview: Takarazuka Flower Troupe 2021 production of "Gin-chan's Love", based on Tsuka Kouhei's "Kamata Kōshin Kyoku". A human interest tale of the kind you've never seen before. It all starts when the egoistic actor Gin-chan's girlfriend Konatsu gets pregnant, and he forces his underling, the stunt actor Yasu, and Konatsu to get married against their wills....
title: Gin-chan's Love
